page.title: 09Elderly People in Pin Green.
page.content: {Martin's House}is a home at the{Oval for old people who need some help.The {Warden}works 8 hours a day;all the workers wear a pink, dark pink or a green dress.Many of the retired people (aged from 65 to 98) have difficulty getting into{baths},so they have a special bath called a medic bath;it has a door so the retired person can go in and sit inside to have a bath.Their favourite meals are roast dinners and shepherd's pie. The{Bulldog Flats at St.Nicholas are for independent elderly people.In every room there is an emergency alarm so if anyone has an accident,they pull a string and it sets off the alarm and red lights begin to flash,so the warden can help. She can speak to each person each day by radio,too.In the main room was a radio,t.v.,books,a recordplayer and some games.
